title: Bowen Jia | Quant & Data Portfolio
text:
我在做 量化策略（Quant Strategies）、数据分析与建模，并把研究过程整理成可复现的作品（代码 + notebook + 报告）。
Focus: Quant Research • Risk Engineering • Data Analytics
Tools: Python • Jupyter • pandas • statsmodels/sklearn • Git/GitHub

title: Reports
text:
Reports
这里放我的报告（PDF/文章）。

Linear Regression Report

title: Linear Regression Project
text:
研究目标：用线性回归分析资产/指数之间的关系

输出：回归系数、显著性、拟合优度（R²）、诊断图等

工具：Python / Jupyter / pandas / statsmodels（或 sklearn）

title: Linear Regression Project
text:
研究目标：用线性回归分析资产/指数之间的关系

输出：回归系数、显著性、拟合优度（R²）、诊断图等

工具：Python / Jupyter / pandas / statsmodels（或 sklearn）

title: Linear Regression Project
text:
What I did

数据清洗与对齐（时间索引、缺失值处理）
构建特征与目标变量（return / log-return / lag features）
拟合模型并解释系数
模型诊断（残差、异方差、离群点等）
结论与局限性分析

title: Linear Regression Project
text:
Links

Notebook: Linear Regression Demo
Report PDF: Regression Report

title: Projects
text:
Projects
这里是我做过的项目（策略 / 建模 / 风控）。点击进入查看完整过程与结果。

Linear Regression Project

import yfinance as yf


company = 'NVDA'
market = '^IXIC'
tickers = [company, market]
start_dt = '2024-11-01'
end_dt = '2025-11-01'


data = yf.download(tickers,start=start_dt,end=end_dt)

returns.plot(subplots= True, title = f"daily returns of {company} and {market}")

array([<Axes: xlabel='Date'>, <Axes: xlabel='Date'>], dtype=object)










from re import M
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.boxplot(returns[market])

{'whiskers': [<matplotlib.lines.Line2D at 0x79710e2fdd00>,
  <matplotlib.lines.Line2D at 0x79710e305730>],
 'caps': [<matplotlib.lines.Line2D at 0x79710e305a30>,
  <matplotlib.lines.Line2D at 0x79710e305d30>],
 'boxes': [<matplotlib.lines.Line2D at 0x79710e304aa0>],
 'medians': [<matplotlib.lines.Line2D at 0x79710e3060f0>],
 'fliers': [<matplotlib.lines.Line2D at 0x79710e3064b0>],
 'means': []}










from re import M
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.scatter(returns[market],returns[company])
plt.xlabel(f"Market Returen {market}")
plt.ylabel(f"Company Returen {company}")
plt.title(f'{company} vs {market}')

Text(0.5, 1.0, 'NVDA vs ^IXIC')










from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
model = LinearRegression()
x = returns[company].values.reshape(-1,1)
y = returns[market].values
model.fit(x,y)

LinearRegression()In a Jupyter environment, please rerun this cell to show the HTML representation or trust the notebook. On GitHub, the HTML representation is unable to render, please try loading this page with nbviewer.org.LinearRegression?Documentation for LinearRegressioniFittedLinearRegression() 



alpha = model.intercept_
beta = model.coef_[0]
print(f"alpha is {alpha}, beta is {beta}")

alpha is 0.0003373046233312245, beta is 0.3970902951091109



import numpy as np
x_vals = np.linspace(returns[market].min(),returns[market].max(),100)
y_vals = alpha + beta * x_vals
plt.scatter(x, y, alpha=0.5,color="pink")
plt.plot(x_vals, y_vals, color='orange')
plt.title(f'Regression Line: {company} vs {market}')

Text(0.5, 1.0, 'Regression Line: NVDA vs ^IXIC')










from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
r2 = r2_score(y, model.predict(x))
print("R² =", r2)

R² = 0.6460036371941396

title: Bowen Jia | Quant & Data Portfolio
text:
我在做 量化策略（Quant Strategies）、数据分析与建模，并把研究过程整理成可复现的作品（代码 + notebook + 报告）。
Focus: Quant Research • Risk Engineering • Data Analytics
Tools: Python • Jupyter • pandas • statsmodels/sklearn • Git/GitHub

title: Bowen Jia | Quant & Data Portfolio
text:
Featured Work

1) Linear Regression Research

完成回归分析流程：数据对齐 → 特征构建 → 模型拟合 → 诊断分析
输出系数解释、显著性、R²，并写出局限性与失效场景

➡️ Project page: Linear Regression Project
➡️ Notebook: Linear Regression Demo
➡️ Report (PDF): Linear Regression Report



2) Quant Strategies (Winter Break)
计划研究路线： - Mean reversion / momentum baseline - Transaction costs & slippage - Walk-forward testing + basic risk controls
➡️ See: Projects
